pr_title: Improve error message when uploading a mef zip file

timeline.message: Improve error message when uploading a mef zip file containing lots of records. Identify the uuid of the record that failed to load.

timeline.bodyText: This is a pretty generic "Exception"? is there something specific you can catch?
timeline.author: jodygarnett

replies.bodyText: I caught the exception thrown by importRecord which is Exception.  importRecord thow Exception which is not ideal and should probably be fixed in a separate PR.
